Ask HN: OSS Alternative to Google Web Light?

stories.text:
Which ones have good email deliverability and is not blocked by firewalls or sign-up systems (like .xyz etc)

In particular keen on knowing about some of the newer ones since a lot of good .coms are taken (i.e. .live etc)

Previous conversation: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=15828571 (2017)
stories.title: Ask HN: Which TLDs are safe and reliable? (2022)

How the Windows Subsystem for Linux Redirects Syscalls (2016)

stories.text:
During the pandemic, I realized that academic research wasn't for me (I'm about to finish my Ph.D.), and I started specializing in data science and machine learning.

I just moved to San Diego but can't get a job until I receive my green card, and I feel I am becoming unproductive. I have never had too much free time, and I don't know how to deal with it?

Any advice to continue with the career change? After I get my work authorization, should I apply for internships or entry-level jobs?

Thanks
stories.title: Changing my career path: from Bioinformatics to Data Science
